Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Netherworld Lane, through the Iilandi University campus.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the road is the Iilandi University's Chancellor's Hall, where a majority of the classes are held. The Hall is very large, and supports nearly ten thousand people simultaneously in just over one hundred separate lecture halls and classrooms. On the south side of the road, you can see the various research facilities such as the Oceancrest Technological Research Facility and Tholian Hall.
